What does the word hue means?
The word "hue" refers to a color or shade, especially a particular shade of a color. For example, "The sky displayed a hue of pink during the sunset."
What does the word lush means?

The word "lush" means having a lot of vegetation, especially plants that are thick, healthy, and thriving. It can also refer to something that is rich and luxurious in appearance or feel, such as a lush velvet fabric. For example, "The garden was lush and green, filled with vibrant flowers and towering trees."
What does the word picturesque means?

The word "picturesque" means visually attractive, charming, or interesting, in a way that would make a good picture or photograph. It is often used to describe scenes, places, or objects that have a natural or quaint beauty that is pleasing to the eye. For example, "The small village was a picturesque scene with its colorful houses, winding streets, and cobblestone alleys."
